name: Just Another Tetris?
description:
Controls

Move: Mouse

Put: Left Button

Rotate:  Right Button

Gameplay

Fill a hole column or raw to clear off cells and get score, just like Tetris.

But Minos can be put to any position rather than falling down.

This is my first game. 

So if you meet some trouble or have some suggestion, feel free to leave a comment below.

Credits

Font: m3x6 by Daniel Linssen (itch.io)
